mapper.select: select A.CO_ID as CO_ID, A.APPR_ITEM_ID as APPR_ITEM_ID, B.APPR_ITEM_NAME as APPR_ITEM_NAME, A.SEQ_NO as SEQ_NO, A.CREATE_DATE as CREATE_DATE, A.IMG_URL as IMG_URL from gw.nw013m A LEFT JOIN gw.nw014m B ON A.CO_ID = B.CO_ID AND A.APPR_ITEM_ID = B.APPR_ITEM_ID AND B.LOCALE = #{lang,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where A.CO_ID = #{coId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by A.SEQ_NO
